recipe.title: Nutrient-Packed Colorful Super Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; apple cider vinegar ; (60 mL)
⅓ cup ; extra virgin olive oil ; (80 mL)
2 cups ; lacinato kale, thinly sliced ; (135 g)
2 cups ; red cabbage, thinly sliced ; (200 g)
1 ; red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced
½ cup ; fresh parlsey, chopped ; (20 g)

steps.step: In a liquid measuring cup, combine the mustard, maple syrup, ginger, garlic, sesame seeds, cayenne, apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, and olive oil. Whisk until fully incorporated. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add the kale, carrots, red cabbage, broccoli, red cabbage, bell pepper, avocado, walnuts, and parsley to a large serving bowl.
Pour desired amount of dressing over the salad and toss until everything is well coated.
Garnish with more toasted sesame seeds
